solution_code:
def add_two_numbers(l1: List[int], l2: List[int]) -> List[int]:
    
    # Initialize the result list with a dummy head
    dummy_head = curr = ListNode(0)
    
    # Initialize the carry
    carry = 0
    
    # While there are digits left in either l1 or l2
    while l1 or l2:
        # Calculate the sum of two numbers plus carry from the last iteration
        temp_sum = carry
        if l1:
            temp_sum += l1.val
            l1 = l1.next
        if l2:
            temp_sum += l2.val
            l2 = l2.next
        
        # Update the carry
        carry = temp_sum // 10
        
        # Create the new node with the digit in temp_sum (excluding the carry)
        curr.next = ListNode(temp_sum % 10)
        # Move to the next digit
        curr = curr.next
    
    # After adding all pairs of digits, check if there is still a carry left
    # If so, append it to the end of the list
    if carry > 0:
        curr.next = ListNode(carry)
    
    # Return the whole list, exclude the dummy head
    return dummy_head.next
